QuestData.Title: Escape from Skettis
QuestData.Description: Hail, $n. I thank you for coming to my aid.$B$BThe arakkoa's monstrous birds knocked me from my nether ray while on a scouting mission.$B$BLet's get out of here, while we can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort the Skyguard Prisoner to safety and report to Sky Sergeant Doryn.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Sky Sergeant Doryn at Blackwind Landing in Terokkar Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for rescuing one of our scouts, $n. We lose good people every day and there aren't enough new recruits to replace them.
